I'm proud of my ability to stay calm under pressure.

we drink beer and eat food.

content.text: I am happy that my partner and I are going strong, and I'm excited to see what the future holds for us!
I do a lot of photography. I like taking pictures of the world around me.
That sounds fun! I like to go out to eat and drink beer with my friends.
I do not like coffee, but I love beer!
I am sorry for your loss. I lost my best friend when I was 16. It is hard to move on, but it is possible.
Thank you. It is hard, but I am getting through it.
That is good to hear. I am proud of your ability to stay calm under pressure.
Thank you. I am glad that I have that trait.
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
That is good that you try to make time for them. I am really close with my family.
I am glad to hear that. I enjoy comedies. What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like action movies and comedies. I also like watching documentaries.
Those sound like good choices. I like to watch action movies too.
